p: Moreover, FAS may be an important modulator of feeding regulation. C75 is a synthetic inhibitor of FAS found to suppress food intake in obese mice mediated by NPY/AgRP orexigenic neurons, also increasing the expression of Melanin-Concentrating Hormone and its receptor in the hypothalamus. C75 reduced body weight and body fat content, and normalized obesity-associated hyperglycaemia and hyperinsulinemia ( 55, 57, 60). In the present study, we observed lower food and calorie intake in the HFD+GbE rats, which may be associated with decreased levels of FAS gene expression and protein synthesis.
